Text.Value: Resist happiness.
*Such unbearable happiness. Laughter bubbles within you, eager to escape.*

EditorData.AnimationTags: *DUPE* [Player] Laughter erupts uncontrollably, leaves player breathless <ChrisW>

Text.Value: Goodness, but what hath come over thee?
Mine curse hast become thine. Hehe hehee - alack!
*Your mood levels out. You have found balance.*
What's happening? What are you doing to me?
*A smile reaches your lips, then melts away. A full laugh could be next.*
Think dark thoughts. Suppress the cheer.
*You suddenly feel cheerful. Too cheerful - as if even the grimmest sight might make you laugh.*

EditorData.AnimationTags: [Player] Holding the Amulet, a happy feeling washes over <ChrisW>

Text.Value: *The moment is over. The awful, horrible joy has passed.*
Give in to your joy.
Thou think this is mine doing? Ha ha ha! Why, perish the thought!
Ha ha! This is the madness the Sharrans wrought. Whilst thou wearest me, so sharest thou my curse.
*You are overcome by irrational cheer, bordering on madness.*
Resist happiness.
*You are rotted with joy; you are sick with pleasure. This is not happiness - it's an illusion.*

EditorData.AnimationTags: [Player] Laughter erupts uncontrollably, leaves player pained <ChrisW>

Text.Value: Contain your joy.
*The maddening cheer withers away, leaving you breathless.*

EditorData.AnimationTags: *DUPE* [Player] surpress laughter, but left feeling breathless <ChrisW>

Text.Value: *You are taken by an unnatural, unbidden bliss. You could fall down laughing at any moment.*
*The joy fades as quickly as it came.*
Thou dost look quite jolly. What might this mean? Ho ho hee!
The agony of ecstasy - ha ha HEE! Why must pleasure bring such pain?
Again? Hehee. Thou art delirious!
The madness worsens. Thou must resist. Ha ha HO!
Invite the glee into you.
Accept happiness.
*A giggle almost erupts from your throat. This moment strikes you as terribly funny.*

EditorData.AnimationTags: *DUPE* [Player] Holding the Amulet, a happy feeling washes over <ChrisW>

Text.Value: Hehee - methinks thou looks quite mirthful. Is all well with thee?
Hehee - not all is well with thee. Such is the price of mine favours!
Again? Hehee. Thou art delirious!
The madness worsens. Thou must resist. Ha ha HO!
Stifle the strange sense of glee.
Accept happiness.
*Your spirits are sky-high, and your steps unreasonably light.*

EditorData.AnimationTags: *DUPE* [Player] Holding the Amulet, a happy feeling washes over <ChrisW>

Text.Value: *The maddening cheer withers away, leaving you breathless.*

EditorData.AnimationTags: [Player] surpress laughter, but left feeling breathless <ChrisW>

Text.Value: *You are rotted with joy, sick with pleasure. This isn't true happiness - it's an illusion.*

EditorData.AnimationTags: *DUPE* [Player] Laughter erupts uncontrollably, leaves player pained <ChrisW>

Text.Value: Let the cheer flow through you.
*You feel a joy so sudden, so intense, that you nearly collapse from the force of it.*

Synopsis:
Player has left the camp. A few moments later, they are overcome with an unnatural sense of cheer. If they fail the check, they will fall over in laughter every time they use the amulet's special power that day.

The madness has several levels.
